So I dont remember but we have all these wonderful pictures of all these great places that they have been

turns.label: b

turns.text: -- uh um the it would just be besieged by people wanting to be your guide and you there were some places
where people defini- - there would be kids there that were excellent at ripping you off
and we had nothing taken because we knew and we had things in inside pockets and in you know in jacket underneath coat type of thing
turns.label: sd

turns.text: We we found that in Jamaica It was the same way
turns.label: sd

turns.text: that people would come up and try and sell you well try and sell drugs and things like that but they they were so destitute and I guess they they make all their money on tourism and and they would come up and ask you you know if if you want to buy different things and really after awhile it really gets annoying
you know it its little scary too when theyre coming up and theyre all over you

turns.label: sd
